trans-unit.source: Loading a different template is not a good use of this action hook. If you include another template and then use exit() (or die()), no subsequent template_redirect hooks will be run, which could break the site’s functionality. Instead, use the template_include filter hook to return the path to the new template you want to use. This will allow an alternative template to be used without interfering with the WordPress loading process.
trans-unit.target: Loading a different template is not a good use of this action hook. If you include another template and then use exit() (or die() ), no subsequent template_redirect hooks will be run, which could break the site’s functionality. Instead, use the template_include filter hook to return the path to the new template you want to use. This will allow an alternative template to be used without interfering with the WordPress loading process.

trans-unit.source: NOTE:Ticket #28099: Passing an empty array to post__in will return has_posts() as true (and all posts will be returned). Logic should be used before hand to determine if WP_Query should be used in the event that the array being passed to post__in is empty.
trans-unit.target: 참고 : 티켓 # 28099 :에 빈 배열을 전달 post__in 하는 반환합니다 has_posts() 사실 (모든 게시물이 반환됩니다) 등. post__in 에 전달되는 배열 이 비어있는 경우 WP_Query 를 사용해야하는지 여부를 결정하기 위해 미리 논리를 사용해야합니다 .

trans-unit.source: Note: If you use the_post() with your query, you need to run wp_reset_postdata() afterwards to have template tags use the main query’s current post again.
trans-unit.target: 참고 : 쿼리에 the_post () 를 사용하는 경우 나중에 wp_reset_postdata () 를 실행 하여 템플릿 태그가 기본 쿼리의 현재 게시물을 다시 사용하도록해야합니다.

trans-unit.source: Note: you cannot combine post__in and post__not_in in the same query.
trans-unit.target: 참고 : post__in 과 post__not_in 을 동일한 쿼리에서 결합 할 수 없습니다 .

trans-unit.source: Note:Ticket #18408 For querying posts in the admin, consider using get_posts() as wp_reset_postdata() might not behave as expected.
trans-unit.target: 참고 : 티켓 # 18408 관리자에서 게시물을 쿼리 하는 경우 wp_reset_postdata () 가 예상대로 작동하지 않을 수 있으므로 get_posts () 를 사용하는 것이 좋습니다 .

trans-unit.source: Note: If a persistent object cache backend (such as memcached) is used, these flags are set to false by default since there is no need to update the cache every page load when a persistent cache exists.

trans-unit.source: A "first-order" clause is one that contains any of the first-order clause keys (‘terms’, ‘taxonomy’, ‘include_children’, ‘field’, ‘operator’). An empty clause also counts as a first-order clause, for backward compatibility. Any clause that doesn’t meet this is determined, by process of elimination, to be a higher-order query.
trans-unit.target: "1 차"절은 1 차 절 키 ( 'terms', 'taxonomy', 'include_children', 'field', 'operator')를 포함하는 절입니다. 빈 절은 역 호환성을 위해 1 차 절로 계산됩니다. 이를 충족하지 않는 절은 제거 과정에 따라 상위 쿼리로 결정됩니다.

trans-unit.source: A WP_Error instance can be returned if an error occurs, and this should match the format used by API methods internally (that is, the status data should be used). A callback can return true to indicate that the authentication method was used, and it succeeded.

The custom class should extend this class and can override its methods individually as necessary. The file must return the instance of the class that should be registered.
trans-unit.target: 드롭 인 'fatal-error-handler.php'를 사용하여이 클래스의 인스턴스를 재정의하고 WordPress가 등록하는 치명적 오류 처리기에 대한 사용자 지정 구현을 사용할 수 있습니다. 사용자 정의 클래스는이 클래스를 확장해야하며 필요에 따라 해당 메소드를 개별적으로 대체 할 수 있습니다. 파일은 등록해야 할 클래스의 인스턴스를 반환해야합니다.

trans-unit.source: A drop-in ‘php-error.php’ can be used as a custom template. This drop-in should control the HTTP status code and print the HTML markup indicating that a PHP error occurred. Note that this drop-in may potentially be executed very early in the WordPress bootstrap process, so any core functions used that are not part of wp-includes/load.php should be checked for before being called.
trans-unit.target: 드롭 인 'php-error.php'는 사용자 정의 템플릿으로 사용할 수 있습니다. 이 드롭 인은 HTTP 상태 코드를 제어하고 PHP 오류가 발생했음을 나타내는 HTML 마크 업을 인쇄해야합니다. 이 드롭 인은 WordPress 부트 스트랩 프로세스 초기에 잠재적으로 매우 일찍 실행될 수 있으므로 wp-includes/load.php 의 일부가 아닌 사용 된 모든 핵심 기능 을 호출하기 전에 확인해야합니다.

trans-unit.source: A key is considered ‘expired’ if it exactly matches the value of the user_activation_key field, rather than being matched after going through the hashing process. This field is now hashed; old values are no longer accepted but have a different WP_Error code so good user feedback can be provided.
trans-unit.target: 키가 해싱 프로세스를 거친 후 일치하지 않고 user_activation_key 필드의 값과 정확히 일치하면 '만료 된'것으로 간주됩니다. 이 필드는 이제 해시됩니다. 이전 값은 더 이상 허용되지 않지만 다른 WP_Error 코드가 있으므로 좋은 사용자 피드백을 제공 할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: A large function that generates the rewrite rules for a given structure, <var>$permalink_structure</var>. If <var>$page</var> is true, an extra rewrite rule will be generated for accessing different pages (e.g. /category/tech/page/2 points to the second page of the ‘tech’ category archive). If <var>$feed</var> is true, extra rewrite rules will be generated for obtaining a feed of the current page, and if <var>$forcomments</var> is true, this will be a comment feed. If <var>$walk_dirs</var> is true, then a rewrite rule will be generated for each directory of the structure provided, e.g. if you provide it with ‘/%year%/%month%/%day/’, rewrite rules will be generated for ‘/%year%/’, /%year%/%month%/’ and ‘/%year%/%month%/%day%/’. This returns an associative array using the regex part of the rewrite rule as the keys and redirect part of the rewrite rule as the value.
trans-unit.target: A large function that generates the rewrite rules for a given structure, <var>$permalink_structure</var> . If <var>$page</var> is true, an extra rewrite rule will be generated for accessing different pages (e.g. /category/tech/page/2 points to the second page of the ‘tech’ category archive). If <var>$feed</var> is true, extra rewrite rules will be generated for obtaining a feed of the current page, and if <var>$forcomments</var> is true, this will be a comment feed. If <var>$walk_dirs</var> is true, then a rewrite rule will be generated for each directory of the structure provided, e.g. if you provide it with ‘/%year%/%month%/%day/’, rewrite rules will be generated for ‘/%year%/’, /%year%/%month%/’ and ‘/%year%/%month%/%day%/’. This returns an associative array using the regex part of the rewrite rule as the keys and redirect part of the rewrite rule as the value.

trans-unit.source: A large method that generates the rewrite rules for a given structure, <var>$permalink_structure</var>.
trans-unit.target: A large method that generates the rewrite rules for a given structure, <var>$permalink_structure</var> .

trans-unit.source: A loopback is when WordPress queries itself, for example to start a new WP_Cron instance, or when editing a plugin or theme. This has shown itself to be a recurring issue as code can very easily break this interaction.
trans-unit.target: 루프백은 WordPress가 자체적으로 쿼리하는 경우 (예 : 새 WP_Cron 인스턴스를 시작하거나 플러그인 또는 테마를 편집 할 때)입니다. 코드가이 상호 작용을 매우 쉽게 중단 할 수 있기 때문에 반복되는 문제인 것으로 나타났습니다.

trans-unit.source: A permalink structure (permastruct) is an abstract definition of a set of rewrite rules; it is an easy way of expressing a set of regular expressions that rewrite to a set of query strings. The new permastruct is added to the WP_Rewrite::$extra_permastructs array.
trans-unit.target: 영구 링크 구조 (permastruct)는 일련의 재 작성 규칙에 대한 추상 정의입니다. 쿼리 문자열 집합으로 다시 쓰는 정규식 집합을 표현하는 쉬운 방법입니다. 새로운 permastruct가 WP_Rewrite :: $ extra_permastructs 배열에 추가됩니다.

trans-unit.source: A plugin can modify data by binding a callback to a filter hook. When the filter is later applied, each bound callback is run in order of priority, and given the opportunity to modify a value by returning a new value.
trans-unit.target: 플러그인은 콜백을 필터 후크에 바인딩하여 데이터를 수정할 수 있습니다. 나중에 필터를 적용하면 각 바운드 콜백이 우선 순위대로 실행되며 새 값을 반환하여 값을 수정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: A plugin may use the ‘image_downsize’ filter to hook into and offer image resizing services for images. The hook must return an array with the same elements that are normally returned from the function.
trans-unit.target: A plugin may use the ‘image_downsize’ filter to hook into and offer image resizing services for images. The hook must return an array with the same elements that are normally returned from the function.

trans-unit.source: A plugin may use the ‘image_downsize’ filter to hook into and offer image resizing services for images. The hook must return an array with the same elements that are returned in the function. The first element being the URL to the new image that was resized.
trans-unit.target: 플러그인은 'image_downsize' 필터를 사용하여 이미지에 연결하고 이미지 크기 조정 서비스를 제공 할 수 있습니다. 후크는 함수에서 반환 된 것과 동일한 요소를 가진 배열을 반환해야합니다. 첫 번째 요소는 크기가 조정 된 새 이미지의 URL입니다.

trans-unit.source: A plugin or theme can use this function multiple times as long as it will help to better present the suggested policy content. For example modular plugins such as WooCommerse or Jetpack can add or remove suggested content depending on the modules/extensions that are enabled. For more information see the Plugin Handbook: https://developer.wordpress.org/plugins/privacy/suggesting-text-for-the-site-privacy-policy/.
trans-unit.target: 플러그인 또는 테마는 제안 된 정책 컨텐츠를보다 잘 표현하는 데 도움이되는 한이 기능을 여러 번 사용할 수 있습니다. 예를 들어 WooCommerse 또는 Jetpack과 같은 모듈 식 플러그인은 활성화 된 모듈 / 확장 프로그램에 따라 제안 된 컨텐츠를 추가하거나 제거 할 수 있습니다. 자세한 내용은 플러그인 핸드북 ( https://developer.wordpress.org/plugins/privacy/suggesting-text-for-the-site-privacy-policy/)을 참조하십시오 .

trans-unit.source: A secondary query loop using $sec_query = new WP_Query() and $sec_query->the_post() affects the global $post variable. The global $post variable is used by template tags by default. wp_reset_postdata() restores the global $post variable to the current post in the main query (contained in the global $wp_query variable as opposed to the $sec_query variable), so that the template tags refer to the main query loop by default again.
trans-unit.target: $sec_query = new WP_Query() 및 $sec_query->the_post() 사용하는 보조 쿼리 루프 는 전역 $post 변수에 영향을줍니다 . 전역 $post 변수는 기본적 으로 템플릿 태그에서 사용됩니다 . wp_reset_postdata() 는 템플릿 태그가 기본적으로 기본 쿼리 루프를 다시 참조하도록 전역 $post 변수를 기본 쿼리 ( $sec_query 변수가 아닌 전역 $wp_query 변수에 포함)의 현재 게시물로 복원 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A session token is a long, random string. It is used in a cookie to link that cookie to an expiration time and to ensure the cookie becomes invalidated when the user logs out.

trans-unit.source: Always use esc_url when sanitizing URLs (in text nodes, attribute nodes or anywhere else). Rejects URLs that do not have one of the provided whitelisted protocols (defaulting to http, https, ftp, ftps, mailto, news, irc, gopher, nntp, feed, and telnet), eliminates invalid characters and removes dangerous characters. This function encodes characters as HTML entities: use it when generating an (X)HTML or XML document. Encodes ampersands (&) and single quotes (‘) as numeric entity references (&#038, &#039).
trans-unit.target: Always use esc_url when sanitizing URLs (in text nodes, attribute nodes or anywhere else). This function encodes characters as HTML entities: use it when generating an (X)HTML or XML document. Encodes ampersands (&) and single quotes (‘) as numeric entity references (&#038, &#039).
